hard_constraints.description: Business policy dictates that each row must contain no more than one queen to maintain operational separation.
Compliance standards require that every column on the board must be occupied by at most one queen.
For safety and security purposes, no two queens are permitted to occupy the same positive diagonal.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- queen(R1,C1), queen(R2,C2), R1 < R2, R1 + C1 = R2 + C2.

hard_constraints.description: System integrity rules strictly forbid the placement of multiple queens on the same negative diagonal.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- queen(R1,C1), queen(R2,C2), R1 < R2, R1 - C1 = R2 - C2.
